author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Batman's arsenal of gadgets were put to great use on the big screen, and we learn just how some of these props were made possible using practical special effects. From the "Super Batarang" that homed in on villains in Batman Returns to his iconic grapnel shooter, Adam and Propstore's Brandon Alinger examine how each of these hand props were made. Plus, one of Penguin's most memorable umbrella props!

Learn more about the upcoming Propstore EMLA: Los Angeles summer 2025 auction at https://propstoreauction.com/auctions/info/id/456

Shot by Joey Fameli and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

title: The Practical Special Effects of Batman's Gadgets!
